name: Return to the Skies
description:
𝑅𝑒𝓉𝓊𝓇𝓃   𝓉𝑜   𝓉𝒽𝑒   𝒮𝓀𝒾𝑒𝓈 

Fallen from their rightful place in the sky, the stars have been strewn throughout a new land. But they do not belong there. Can you find them all and return them to where they belong?

Return to the Skies is a short and sweet platform game. With simple controls, relaxing music and non-stressful gameplay, Return to the Skies is a game with the aim to unwind. Explore and travel through different areas and find the missing stars, aided by mysterious owl figures. 

Appreciate the soundtrack and scenery as you explore, enjoying the features: 

  • simple platform game mechanics
  • helpful owl figures
  • collectable power-up and stars
  • traverse different areas
  • locate secret underground tunnels
  • make use of friendly wind currents, however beware water! 

This game is free to play, available for download on Windows.

 𝓉𝒽𝒶𝓃𝓀   𝓎𝑜𝓊   𝒻𝑜𝓇   𝓎𝑜𝓊𝓇   𝒾𝓃𝓉𝑒𝓇𝑒𝓈𝓉   <3
